info.title: League Lytics Football API
info.description: The API to football related data on League Lytics

get.description: The players endpoint returns general information regarding players in the system. The endpoint is paginated and will need to be called several times to traverse everything.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of players to return per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Returns only players matching the position. Valid value is one of QB, RB, WR, TE, K or DEF.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Returns only players that belong to the team specified. The value should be the team's unique ID

get.summary: Returns the player specified by id
get.description: This endpoint returns a player object specified by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the player you wish to retrieve

200.description: The player was found and returned

player_id.description: Unique identifer for the player object

posiiton.description: Player's normal playing position. Valid values are QB, RB, WR, TE, K and DEF

picture_url.description: URL pointing to an image of the assoicated player

team_id.description: Unique idenfiter for the team that the player belongs to

message.description: The error message returned with the query
